rooms.description: Spacious entry with natural lighting and Vastu-aligned orientation.
Open-plan living area featuring Mediterranean elements such as stone textures and terracotta accents.
Elegant dining space with large windows to the garden ensuring ample daylight.
Modern kitchen designed for luxury cooking with state-of-the-art appliances and Mediterranean finishes.
Cozy guest bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Functional study area designed for work and relaxation, complementing Vastu principles for clarity and focus.
